verses.verse: Then Zophar <WH6691> the Naamathite <WH5284> answered, <WH6030>
"Therefore do my thoughts <WH5587> give answer <WH7725> to me, <WH2363> even by reason of my haste that is in me.
I have heard <WH8085> the reproof <WH4148> which puts me to shame. <WH3639> The spirit <WH7307> of my understanding <WH998> answers me. <WH6030>
Don't <WH3045> you know this from old <WH5703> time, <WH120> since man was placed <WH7760> on earth, <WH776>
that the triumphing <WH7445> of the wicked <WH7563> is short, <WH7138> the joy <WH8057> of the godless <WH2611> but for a moment? <WH7281>
Though his height <WH7863> mount up <WH5927> to the heavens, <WH8064> and his head <WH7218> reach <WH5060> to the clouds, <WH5645>
yet he shall perish <WH6> forever <WH5331> like his own dung. <WH1561> Those who have seen <WH7200> him shall say, <WH559> <WH335> 'Where is he?'
He shall fly away <WH5774> as a dream, <WH2472> and shall not be found. <WH4672> Yes, <WH5074> he shall be chased away like a vision <WH2384> of the night. <WH3915>
The eye <WH5869> which saw <WH7805> him shall see him no more, <WH3254> neither shall his place <WH4725> any more see him. <WH3254>
His children <WH1121> shall seek the favor <WH7521> of the poor. <WH1800> His hands <WH3027> shall give back <WH7725> his wealth. <WH202>
His bones <WH6106> are full <WH4390> of his youth, <WH5934> but youth shall lie down <WH7901> with him in the dust. <WH6083>
"Though wickedness <WH7451> is sweet <WH4985> in his mouth, <WH6310> though he hide <WH3582> it under his tongue, <WH3956>
though he spare <WH2550> it, <WH5800> and will not let it go, but keep it still <WH4513> within <WH8432> his mouth; <WH2441>
yet his food <WH3899> in his bowels <WH4578> is turned. <WH2015> It is cobra <WH6620> venom <WH4846> within him. <WH7130>
He has swallowed down <WH1104> riches, <WH2428> and he shall vomit them up again. <WH6958> God <WH410> will cast them out <WH3423> of his belly. <WH990>
He shall suck <WH3243> cobra <WH6620> venom. <WH7219> The viper <WH660>'s tongue <WH3956> shall kill him. <WH2026>
He shall not look <WH7200> at the rivers, <WH6390> the flowing <WH5104> streams <WH6390> of honey <WH1706> and butter. <WH2529>
That for which he labored <WH3022> he shall restore, <WH7725> and shall not swallow it down. <WH1104> According to the substance <WH2428> that he has gotten, <WH8545> he shall not rejoice. <WH5965>
For he has oppressed <WH7533> and forsaken <WH5800> the poor. <WH1800> He has violently taken away <WH1497> a house, <WH1004> and he shall not build it up. <WH1129>
"Because he knew <WH3045> no quietness <WH7961> within him, <WH990> he shall not save <WH4422> anything of that in which he delights. <WH2530>
There was nothing <WH400> left <WH8300> that he didn't <WH2898> devour, therefore his prosperity shall not endure. <WH2342>
In the fullness <WH4390> of his sufficiency, <WH5607> distress <WH3334> shall overtake him. <WH3027> The hand of everyone who is in misery <WH6001> shall come on him. <WH935>
When he is about to fill <WH4390> his belly, <WH990> God will cast <WH7971> the fierceness <WH2740> of his wrath <WH639> on him. <WH4305> It will rain on him while he is eating. <WH3894>
He shall flee <WH1272> from the iron <WH1270> weapon. <WH5402> The bronze <WH5154> arrow <WH7198> shall strike him through. <WH2498>
He draws <WH8025> it forth, <WH3318> and it comes out of his body. <WH1465> Yes, <WH1300> the glittering point comes out <WH1980> of his liver. <WH4846> Terrors are on him. <WH367>

All darkness <WH2822> is laid <WH2934> up for his treasures. <WH6845> An unfanned <WH5301> fire <WH784> shall devour <WH398> him. <WH3415> It shall consume that which is left <WH8300> in his tent. <WH168>
The heavens <WH8064> shall reveal <WH1540> his iniquity. <WH5771> The earth <WH776> shall rise up against him. <WH6965>
The increase <WH2981> of his house <WH1004> shall depart. <WH1540> They shall rush away <WH5064> in the day <WH3117> of his wrath. <WH639>
This is the portion <WH2506> of a wicked <WH7563> man <WH120> from God, <WH430> the heritage <WH5159> appointed <WH561> to him by God. <WH410>"
